channel.title: Perfection on Simba Tango

item.title: Almost perfect
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description: byÂ Stuck in Customs It was my first tanda in the milongas with her. In the break between two dances at the legendary milonga at Club Sunderland, I was chatting with la preciosa, who later became one of my dearest tango friends. She asked me if I knew who was dancing (the exhibition) that night, and I confirmed, that yes, of course I knew. It was the very reason I went there that night, in fact.
